metadata.title: CVE-2024-22562 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: swftools 0.9.2 was discovered to contain a Stack Buffer Underflow via thefunction dict_foreach_keyvalue at swftools/lib/q.c.

criterions.comment: swftools: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
